name: Lexy Tee
description: inspired by one of our favorite vintage tees in the vault. timeless and elegant double screen on our single stitch, raw hem cut, black tee. please note, distressing throughout. wash cold and hang dry.

name: White Nocrate Punk Tee
description: Our take on the perfect vintage white tee, crafted from 100% cotton. ~ minimal distressing around the sleeve edges and collar gives it that authentic worn-in look.~ raw hem cut at the bottom for the ideal crop at the waist. ~ hand screen-printed ~ designed to fade beautifully, this tee is a staple

name: Nocrate Co. 9 Hoodie
description: 100% french terry cotton. wash on cold and air dry. our hoodies are intentionally distressed to achieve a true vintage look. variations in distressing, such as frayed edges or faded areas, are part of the design and add to the unique character of each piece. these features are not defects but are intentional elements that contribute to the overall style of the hoodie.

name: Black Nocrate Hoodie
description: our hoodies are intentionally distressed to achieve a true vintage look. variations in distressing, such as frayed edges or faded areas, are part of the design and add to the unique character of each piece. these features are not defects but are intentional elements that contribute to the overall style of the hoodie.

name: Nocrate classic tee
description: Our take on the perfect vintage white tee, crafted from 100% cotton. ~ minimal distressing around the sleeve edges and collar gives it that authentic worn-in look.~ raw hem cut at the bottom for the ideal crop at the waist. ~ hand screen-printed ~ designed to fade beautifully, this tee is a staple
